p: The People's Climate Movement (PCM) is a coalition of civil organizations, including environmental and religious organizations, unions, and social justice groups in the US, that advocate for political and social change to address the effects of climate change. Since 2014, it has been holding marches in the US to raise awareness and call for action on climate issues. In 2018, PCM led the Rise for Climate, Jobs and Justice March in San Francisco with over 30,000 participants, while organizing several events in the US [18].
